name: Karl Smith
review: As a previous user of the Bus Times app I loved it for it's useful information, so much so that I paid the Â£8 to unlock all features.. unfortunately now the app has had a refresh and they have decided to run it as a subscription service, and all the features I paid to unlock have now been locked again behind their subscription model! To have the same functionality I previously had they want Â£13 off me. And I feel that is totally unacceptable, I paid for this app! Either refund or unlock!

name: Tony Stark
review: App says there are no buses running today, when other buses are going past.

name: Denise Davidson
review: This bus app is very good. I can see when my bus is due

name: Chris Artamonov
review: Cant find a worse app to put long ads in, if you're in a rush and need to check the times, and suddenly an ad pops up lasting 20 seconds. Please sort this ad situation out. Before you start saying you need the revenue from ads, what I'm meaning to say is cut the ads a lot shorter, so people dont miss their buses.

name: Anna Mistry
review: You have to wait 5-30 seconds for an advert every time app opens, can never just check the bus times. It gets extremely frustrating, especially when you are waiting for an irregular bus.

name: Mick Mc
review: Very good most of the time. Occasionally gives a 'none due' status for all buses. No reason given.

name: Brenda Codrington
review: I totally enjoy using it, as it tells you how long you have to wait for a bus. I'm so glad to have downloaded it!

name: Jadedon Meredith
review: Too much ads and the bus time is not accurate anymore. The app also says none due when a bus is actually near by

name: bose shola
review: I love using the apps, helps a lot to check bus times

name: Krisztian Borbas
review: Very angry. It was the best app on market when it was new. Loved it - fast, accurate, easy to handle. Now is the worst on market. I can see for the developers the money first. Adds and adds and adds, when the people want to see one thing: when and where the next bus us coming. That WAS the best and qickest app to do it. Now full with adds. Purpose lost. And before you answer, please don't. I will switch to other, free, quicker app - as you are not alone with your app, and not worth pay for it.

name: N Y
review: It used to be a good app, not anymore. 30 seconds ad and cannot skip it. It says no internet connection many times, need to open and close the app. I do not have time to play.

name: J P
review: Excessive ads!!! You now have to watch a 30sec ad to use the app with no option to skip. Even You Tube doesn't force that on you. Times are pretty inaccurate too.

name: Philip Harvey
review: This app used to be extremely reliable but ever since the latest update there are so many issues. The biggest issue for me is the 'none due' and no arrival times, defeating the entire objective of the app. Also the 30 second refresh is incredibly annoying, having to back out of a bus stop and enter again is the quickest way to update. Bring back the pull down refresh option and sort out the arrival bugs, until then I'm uninstalling.

name: Jackie Coyle
review: Use this alot as use buses to get around for work

name: Sandra Lindo
review: App is very good. But there is one major problem. When a bus stop is closed or a route is on diversion it would be handy for the app to tell us, so we know where we're going before we leave out. Nothing is more frustrating than walking a wasted 10 minutes to the bus stop and finding that the bus stop is closed or the whole route is on diversion. Then you have to walk 20 minutes back onto yourself to get to another route. Fix this major issue and I will give 5 stars.

name: Gabija GirdenytÄ—
review: for new version, doesn't allow to check route without turning location setting on. clicking on certain bus stop doesnt allow to see when it's arriving, as it used to be. i can choose to travel from few different bus stops via different routes, so this new version made it all too complicated. very disappointed, will have to find alternative to this app if it doesn't change back to normal.

name: Joshua Kettle
review: Absolute garbage... The route planner is the worst part. There was this one time where I needed to get from Walthemstow central to Loughton station, and no matter how long i messed with the app, all I got was 2 hour long routes where I needed to change onto three different buses, but theres a 20 Debden bus that goes straight to Loughton in about half an hour! Want to get this app? You're better off just getting on a bus and seeing what happens honestly...

name: la s
review: Rarely reliable The bus times sometimes don't load on the app for the bus stop I select. At first I thought there were no buses due for a while but then I look at the countdown on the actual bus stop itself and can see bus times showing. When the bus times do show, the times aren't always correct. Eg. Arrival time for bus says due but you select that bus and see it's 4 stops away. Doesn't make sense.

name: Marcus Smullen
review: Advertising is loud and intrusive, interfering with all other apps, also interrupt quick urgent searches for buses, so much so that I have missed several buses waiting on adverts. As you have said you need the advertising money, but should there not be an option to at least mute the sound rather than having to try and turn down the volume before my ears bleed.

name: Richard Baker
review: While this app works, the attitude of the developers is that if you decline to rate the app that they spam you with full screen adverts rather than just the banners.

name: Stefan Jeffrey
review: Used to be a great app but recently I'm unable to see when buses are arriving/departing specific locations. As a result I have had to download a separate app to do this and I'm likely to uninstall Bus Times permanently. Update: Bus Times is working again, but the lapse in service has meant I started using Citymapper instead.

name: Mihai Ritivoiu
review: I've been just asked to review this awful app, and I'll take this opportunity to also delete it. I understand you have to make money somehow, but making me wait up to 14 seconds for an ad, while I'm desperately trying to see the bus times in a hurry is just sadistic. I will switch to one of the other apps showing bus times, which I should have done a long time ago.

name: Lewis Kelly
review: It is one thing to have a few ads on but not have them so excessive and at intrusive times that it makes it unfriendly to use is very counterproductive

name: Gaurav Gupta
review: Since the last update it has just filled up with AD space and does not let you see any meaningful information. They have purposefully made the fonts on this app so big that you are forced to navigate your way around all the ads that fill up the entire screen. Complete waste now

name: Lven
review: Very unhappy with the last update. Does not show the buses arrival accurately, the font is way too big and not to mention the 30 sec waiting for an automatic refresh is incredibly annoying. App used to be perfect before.

name: Diagnal
review: Very unreliable. Buses that are "Due" are usually delayed and buses that are 5 mins away, for example, can refresh 30secs later and be due. There are times when the app states that a bus will not be due for 30mins when there are several before that and other times, that there aren't any buses running at all.

name: Agnes Poma
review: The old app is fare more better than this. Anytime I'm in hurry the app never gives the time due. All the buses will say "none due" or the App page goes blank for long time before showing the buses arrival

name: andrej skotsko
review: the app used to be very reliable bit recently it's much more hit and miss. times from Lewisham station for 208 & 136 buses are almost always wrong nowadays. please fix it

review: Incredibly useful app! Tells you when buses are due so you can plan your journey effectively and avoid long waits at the bus stop. Also adapts very quickly to your change of location...love it!ðŸ˜

review: I don't want to be pestered about switching my location ON! Fix it! I should be able to do a search without constantly being asked to switch my location ON.

name: A Google user

review: Even with WIFI on and location it still does not bring up the times. Im lucky if it does hence 2 stars. To follow on since you have sold your soul to the devil and increase the ads all I get are ads and the actual app doesnt even work. Hence drop to 1 star.

name: Philip Jackson
review: Pointless app now outdated by integration with Google maps. The information you get from the app TFL provide freely to anyone who wants it and while they do have to make the app and host it you can get all the information in Google maps making this obsolete. Especially as you don't have to sit through any ads on there. It's incredibly frustrating when you want to quickly open the app to decide to get the bud coming or wait for another to be presented with a 30 second ad just use Google maps

name: Ray Hudson
review: Don't pay for this app. Far too often every bus is shown as "none due" when in fact there are several within the time window. Why can't they sort this out?

name: Humphrey W
review: What you really need when racing for a bus is an unskippable ad. What a stupid idea. Also the data is consistently wrong. Don't install.

name: Alan Blackburn
review: App tells you what time the bus will arrive to the minute but sometimes it is not as accurate as others but generally very good. It also gives you the registration number of the bus as well. Times of buses generally correct. Much better than other apps I have used. Shame other bus apps are not as good for non London routes. Bus stop letters are shown - very useful if you have to get off train and use bus. Planner though does not work.

name: Sibin Thomas
review: 12/2019: uninstalled. response to feedback request via app (10/04/19) UI still not improved as the old version. too big. (review on 17/8/2018) The new update has downgraded the user interface. Note that, this app is for mobiles, not desktop. To use large icons + half screen ads makes least sense. Please revert to old UI, it was the best. Another thing, try citymapper app, check the features and the no. of persistant ads and decide yourself. Don't get me wrong this app was light and good before.

name: Franklin
review: Great app. To improve consider adding notifications when bus is close by.ðŸ‘ðŸ¾

name: ciocoiu ninel
review: After the last update the interface is, in my opinion, uglier and most of the time in the evening it show that no is coming soon as if they have finished the services as they do during the night. What's the point of having a bus timetable app if it doesn't show you the timetable?

name: A Google user
review: Since the update the app is practically useless! Please put old one back on

name: Vince N
review: Amazing how many developers seem to like driving their apps into the ground. The same thing happened to the official TfL App and now this Just this week on 3 of the last 4 days timings have been completely off, sometimes inexplicably changing to something completely different, not after refreshing repeatedly, but after closing the app and starting again And the adverts and multiple dialogues asking for location now mean you're spending the first part of your experience fighting with this app rather than getting your (incorrect) bus times I'm happy to pay to remove ads if an app works, but this one does not reliably perform its primary function for me

name: Aryan H
review: This app is alright, I bought it to avoid the ads. I dont know why they made the bus numbers so large, a list was more convinient.

name: Khrish Vastani
review: Too many ads and sometimes completely messed up timings

name: kev tsang
review:
The most valued function of showing the reg plates of buses for all 
upcoming departures is gone. It used to be a marvelous app that values bus 
connoisseurs' choice of vehicles, for some on earth do not necessarily go 
on a route based on destination. I go by picking the bus I like and might 
end up on a different route and destination. Not everyone travel with a 
fixed destination and ETA of the FIRST bus that comes is not the only thing 
for bus rides. There might be a second bus that I want to know about the 
bus type that comes just a minute later. Would have rated it a 10 star if I 
could before this recent update. But now it deserves a negative rating.

name: S Mahmod
review:
Very annoying. Keep asking for gps location access 3/4 in a row even after 
you said no. New style of adverts means you cannot leave the adverts to see 
bus times. Used to be good. Have to try out alternatives... not happy with 
the app :(

name: Kay Khanom
review:
Was a good app until you completely ruined it. Why break something that

review:
Before the last update it was really good, I always used it. Now I can't

name: Kelly Yeoh
review:
This app used to be brilliant despite the INCESSANT ads. Accurate licence 
plate numbers, estimated arrival time on point.. but this new update has 
basically rendered this app useless. This is the 4th time I have missed my 
bus; this morning's example - I checked the app at 08:12, the app stated 
eta 4mins, I leave the house immediately and walk the 45 seconds to my bus 
stop. I get there, check how long until arrival....... 20 mins until the 
next bus. I will be uninstalling this in favour of another app. If I could 
give no stars I would, sadly I cannot.

name: A Google user
review:

review: I have re-rated this app as 5 stars after a reply from the developer. It is still the best London bus app. Sometimes intermittently and transiently the app stops showing data of East London areas. I guess that is down to the signals from TFL and not the developer's fault. Hurray!!!

review: Already paid for ad-free long ago, yet occasionally still presented with ads.  Have to continually restore purchase every time this happens.  Developer could really do with making standalone ad-free app if they can't keep ads off for those who have paid for ad free!

review: Intrusive full screen ads. They show ads even when I paid full price for the app. Reported this to support on multiple occasions. They don't care at all.  UPD: Yes, I've tried going to the "remove ads" page again.. Helps for a short time, but the ads come back again. Both full screen and notification area ads.

The reason I save favourites and a home stop is so I don't need to drain my battery by keeping my location turned on all the time. Please fix this!

review: Fast and accurate, I can plan my journeys without guesswork. I have to add, I use this app in traveling in outer East London, where I live, and outer West London, there, with special needs daughter, and as is, I rely heavily upon it. As disabled myself, I rely on it for accuracy. For instance, if first bus too packed for me, I can time with precision next bus following. This app, which I use regularly, never  lets me down. Also, I can check from home, best time to leave for bus stop.

review: This looks good and works pretty well but it's still not the first bus times app I head for. Picking a bus from a bus stop I'd like to know where that bus is not be given bus info for the whole route. The bus icons I guess tell you where the bus is but don't give a hint as to which is the bus I picked or when it will arrive where I am. The last thing being the key info I always want. I'm happy for now to stick with my less beautiful but more friendly app

name: Elliot Barker
review: I've had to go back to this app due to the search and bookmark function not being in citymapper.      However I don't like how intrusive the ads now are and they will use up date due to them being videos. Luckily I have unlimited data but there are others that do not.    Its also causing a lot of wakelocks (1000+) with my phone's awake time being 27% because of it. I don't see why it has to keep checking for anything unless it is collecting data.  EDIT: WHY DOES A BUS APP NEED CALENDAR PERMISSIONS?

name: Alex Ngoke
review: I'd always be late without it

name: Dumitru N
review: This is such a rubbish app, it is riddled with adds which contains viruses, it's almost impossible not to get your phone infested while using this app. I had to hard reset my phone twice in one single day as I mistakenly touched one of the adds then my phone went haywire  ! ! Avoid it like plague! !!!

name: John Campbell
review: Just works when it wants to. Keeps saying refresh if I'm not on wifi.

name: Vyan Kana
review: good bus app needs work still

name: Doreen Reid
review: It's very very helpful to me .and easy .one click and you are there never late with it

review: Arriva bus timetable from Chatham to twydall Kent

review: It works, I don't miss my bus

review: Great app,  even tells the bus' numberplate. Overall,  a brilliant tracker.

name: Tracy White
review: Very easy to use and accurate

name: keiron lettin
review: Absolute rubbish con knock off of the original bus london app

name: Ben Gill
review: Its the best bus app out and easy enough to use. It is also incredible accurate. A few things that would make it better in the jounery planner section would be to have an option where you dont need to put a time of depatures and it simply shows you the routes for the full day allowing you to choose one at your liesure. And the other would be a map view option when choosing a destination. When going to a certain place I am unsure which stop to stop at around it nor do I really know street names.

name: Sorcha Williamson
review: Good app but old version better

name: Mrs Paula Edwards
review: Takes too long to get into seeing bus times to May pop ups and crushes

name: Atef Naser
review: Wrong times its says 5 mins wen I refresh it it says 6 more.

name: Mario Coniac

review: Great app but it keeps jumping from one bus route to another without me asking it to.

review: Ads are shown even after I've paid to remove it

name: Ola Opasina
review: Help planing with accuracy and thus saves time. Easy to use.

name: Monti Cole
review: Love it more since the latest upgrade

name: Noel Parson
review: Okay, I understand that we can pay to get rid of ads, which the older version didn't have an option for, but to have ads block the entire screen is taking it a bit too far. If the ads only ran on the bottom of the screen, that's fine. It should then slide up to take up the whole page and stop you from searching for the latest updates on the stop you are at. Great update with new interface. Poor advertising tactics.

name: Dorothy Aladenika
review: Used to love this app but now....

name: Jessica Sirek
review: Was unhappy with new version as it didn't refresh the times as it used to  It just refreshed on its own but now I could not see how to refresh at all! UPDATE Developer response says ust swipe down. Stupid me. This just didn't seem to work at first (probably because the times hadn't changed when I tried it and I'm not patient enough). Still wish it would auto refresh, but I can live without that. VERY USEFUL APP!!!

name: Jim Barry
review: This used to be a good app. It's now full of glitches and useless. Avoid.

name: David Lovell
review: Getting better... but did I miss Christmas?

name: Anthony Holland
review: Doesn't show routes, bus times not live

name: Judi Sullivan
review: The updated app is much easier to use

name: Vinny K
review: Needs a better bus stop map search. Ideally show estimated time of bus in addition to minutes away. Needs ability to reorder favourites. Search button needs to be added to menu... Overall better then some other apps but if all the above improvements were added I would definitely pay to remove adverts.

name: Tomi HÃ¤sÃ¤
review: Finds lines for a stop. There is no easy way to find the Search function.

name: A Google user
review: Annoying app. If you don't have gps on you have to clear a pop-up several times. Then clear a full screen ad. Then clear the gps pop-up again. Favourites are now hidden in a menu which is not very user friendly as you use these 99% of the time.

name: Laura Swartz
review: Bus London was my favorite app. Recently they have introduced 20 sec videos which can't be stopped (this is in addition to other ads ).  When you are on the go and need to check bus times, this is more than frustrating.  Added to this the app often stops receiving data telling me that there is no bus within 30 mins (from every single route in London!) Afraid it happened again this morning - think I may have to uninstall and pay a small amount for reliability and to ensure that I'm free from pesky ads...

name: Clifford Charles
review: IT'S OK BUT TOO MANY ADVERTS.

name: Adina Tudor
review: I simply love it! I use it daily and it never let me down!

name: Trevor Edmead
review: First class app. Only issue that I can see is that it doesn't inform me when a bus, on my particular route, is being terminated short. The app seems to work from the current timetable and doesn't take into consideration any service delays.

name: Attila Farago
review: I loved the app.  Ads was not annoying,  but... It take too much time to find when is your bus coming. Example: you open the app,  choose the nearest stops,  zoom, zoom, zoom... Finally you see your stop.  You click on it. You see is coming in 5 mind.  Ok. But you want to check is it going to the right way., so you click on the bus,  you choose which direction (how should I know? ) after you see what are the stops. Please one button,  nearest stops. Show a list and a map or ask which one is better.

name: john. griffith-Jones
review: Great app which I use everyday.  Thanks for the reply by the developer about the adverts and fingers crossed for a ad free version in the future

name: Josef Bajada
review: Stops near you doesnt work properly. It starts from a very low zoom level instead of street level where you need it. When you zoom in the bus stops near you are not marked or tappable in any way, just the google bus icon that i could get any way from google maps. I need to know the next bus that is coming at my current stop! I dont know the postcodes or street names of where I am and the app already knows where I am!

name: Alain Kowalczyk
review: As good as it always is

name: Elaine Dema
review: Great app saves time hanging around waiting for buses.

name: Ababil Tahir
review: Generally a very useful and reliable app. But has not been working for the last 2 days and I get the messages saying departure information unavailable.

name: mythostheblue
review: No more waiting at the bus stop for nothing :-)

name: A Google user
review: Amazing app, its very useful as well

name: Abdul_Reaction 99
review: It's doing good and bad at the same time

name: Tommaso Kralj
review: Possibly the worst, least user friendly/intuitive/responsive app I've ever had the displeasure of using.

name: melanie veloso
review: The best bus app ever, I'm always on time, never missed a bus, since having this app, I recommend to everyone,thank youuuu

name: Shellie K
review: I have this prog on my iPhone and on my Android Asus tablet. On my iPhone it works beautifully. On my Android tablet it is a half-assed mess. Why can't I save my bookmarked stops? Why no refresh option? Why so much work to get to the bus data? I could go on but what would be the point? I think the developer should either do as good a job on the android platform as they do with IOS or just forget about it.

name: Ben B
review: what the hell!!!.......i loved the Oyster checker...........i love OYSTERS!	great app...works well...very up to date with he bus timings, buuuut...a bit fiddly when trying to upload the route you want and why why why why get rid of the Oyster card balance checker,  3 stars otherwise it would be 5........put the oyster card checker back Dammmmmit.

name: Diane Trinder
review: Love it . Handy to know whe the bus is coming

name: nina virdi
review: Please fix bookmark stops and refresh for android

name: Peter Leach
review: I like the app but why can,t I use the phones SD storage for it?

name: Gemma Hackett
review: Uninstalling due to errors and ad's

name: Andre Fernandez
review: The pop-up ads that have appeared recently were extremely annoying to the point I wanted to uninstall the app a couple of months ago. The scrolling Lloyds ad may have seemed like a good idea in the marketing meeting but if you can't see the options you want to use the app for it renders the app completely pointless. That made me really want to delete this app and begin using something else. Now the flashing horror film ad that invaded my screen just now has given me all the motivation I need to seek another

name: Stevie x
review:
This app was wonderful. It located you and showed nearby stops. Now, 
wherever I am it shows Westminster. Come on! Sort it

name: Capn Buttercup
review: I hate the new update and look of the app. The old look was wayyy better and easier to use than this one.

review: Invasive ads. Poor stability. But good for checking bus in London.

review: The bus time schedule has disappeared and not appearing, it was working in past few days or too but now it's all gone, what has happened to it, and there's no refresh option button.

name: Nafay Shaikh
review: Wish it had a widget EDIT: A widget for a certain stop's bus times. Times for Dublin Bus and London Bus Checker Free have good ones.

name: Joel A
review: It's good (although the times can be completely wrong!) But needs less ads and more work on the times it tells us

review: Recently they have introduced some apps which are undeleted I find this most annoying.

review: Even though it provides really excellent schedule info about London buses, but the fact that on load it displays two ads is really a hard sell for the in app purchase..
